## Loading Data
```{r}
#Finding the AWS S3 bucket
bucket_exists(
  bucket = "s3://survival2024/",
  region = "us-east-1")
files <- get_bucket_df(
  bucket = "s3://survival2024/",
  region = "us-east-1",
  max = 20000) %>%
  as_tibble()
#Downloading files
save_object(
  object = "hurricane.csv",
  bucket = "s3://survival2024/",
  region = "us-east-1",
  file = "hurricane"
)
df <- read.csv("hurricane")
head(df)
```
